General.Name: Zhejiang Jinghua Laser Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Zhejiang Jinghua Laser Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells laser holographic molded products. The company offers laser holographic security paper and anti-counterfeiting film, and anti-counterfeiting pull wire products. It serves cigarettes, alcohol, cosmetics, medicines, food, and other electronic products. Zhejiang Jinghua Laser Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shaoxing, China.
